pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This contains the client-server evaluation application for C2TCP.
It also demonstrates how to set the average delay target for tuning C2TCP, so you can integrate C2TCP application target in your app.
Alpha is the setpoint indirectly controlled by Target. If alpha increases, throughput increases. If alpha decreases, the algorithm becomes more delay sensitive.

use.flag: Install cellular-traces to train the DRL.
Install the kernel patch to apply on kernel sources.
